default_end_gcode:
; Section 1: Position and Home Y
G21 ; Set units to millimeters
G90 ; Absolute positioning (default for all commands)
M83 ; Relative extrusion mode
M104 S250 ; Set nozzle temperature to 250°C

; Starting position: X241, Y211 (bed dropped due to gravity)
G1 Z3 F1200 ; Lower Z to 3mm (safe height for ejection and wipe)
G1 Y-4 F3000 ; Move bed to Y-4 (ejects print)
M300 S1000 P500 ; Beep at 1000 Hz for 500 ms
G4 P600 ; Wait 600 ms

; Move bed to Y150 before homing
G1 Y150 F3000 ; Move bed to Y150

; Home Y-axis only
G1 Z5 F1200 ; Raise Z to 5mm to avoid collisions during homing
G28 Y ; Home Y-axis (Y to 0)

G90 ; Ensure absolute positioning
G1 Z10 F1200 ; Raise Z to 10mm for safety (adjust if needed)
G28 Z ; Home Z-axis

; Move bed to wiper position (Y3)
G1 Z3 F1200 ; Lower Z to 3mm for wipe
G1 Y3 F3000 ; Move bed to Y3 (wiper's front edge)

; Section 2: Nozzle Wipe Sequence (within wiper: X208-X246, Y3-Y12)
G1 X245 Y3 F3600 ; Move to right edge of wiper (X245, Y3)

; X-axis wipes starting at Y5, increasing Y by 1 each move (within X208 to X246)
G1 X245 Y5 F6000 ; Move to starting position (X245, Y5)
G1 X208 Y5 F6000 ; Wipe left to X208 at Y5
G1 X246 Y6 F6000 ; Wipe right to X246 at Y6
G1 X208 Y7 F6000 ; Wipe left to X208 at Y7
G1 X246 Y8 F6000 ; Wipe right to X246 at Y8
G1 X208 Y9 F6000 ; Wipe left to X208 at Y9
G1 X246 Y10 F6000 ; Wipe right to X246 at Y10

; Y-axis wipes with X shifts (4 passes, Y3 to Y12)
G1 X246 Y12 F6000 ; Pass 1: Wipe back to Y12 at X246
G1 X246 Y3 F6000 ; Wipe forward to Y3
G1 X241 Y12 F6000 ; Pass 2: Wipe back to Y12 at X241
G1 X241 Y3 F6000 ; Wipe forward to Y3
G1 X232 Y12 F6000 ; Pass 3: Wipe back to Y12 at X232
G1 X232 Y3 F6000 ; Wipe forward to Y3
G1 X223 Y12 F6000 ; Pass 4: Wipe back to Y12 at X223
G1 X223 Y3 F6000 ; Wipe forward to Y3

M104 S0 ; Turn off the nozzle by setting temperature to 0°C

; End nozzle wipe sequence
G1 X245 Y3 F6000 ; Return to wiper's right edge (X245, Y3)
G1 Z50 F1200 ; Raise Z to 50mm (safe height)
